description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Old School Racer is a fun, fast paced motorbike game that will have you coming back for more!  Upgrade your bike to set even faster times on the global scoreboard!   With over 20 crazy levels and 13 dirt bikes to choose from, prepare to loose sleep!
